me.shoutto.sdk

Class StmError

  • java.lang.Object
    • me.shoutto.sdk.StmError

  • public class StmError
extends java.lang.Object
    This class is returned in onFailure method of the Callback class. It provides information about a failure that occurred.

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      static java.lang.String SEVERITY_MAJOR
      A constant that represents a major severity of an error.
      static java.lang.String SEVERITY_MINOR
      A constant that represents a minor severity of an error.

      StmError()
      The default constructor.
      StmError(java.lang.String message, boolean blocking, java.lang.String severity)
      The constructor used by the SDK when handling a failure scenario.

      • SEVERITY_MAJOR

        public static final java.lang.String SEVERITY_MAJOR

      • StmError

                boolean blocking,
                java.lang.String severity)
        The constructor used by the SDK when handling a failure scenario.
        Parameters:
        message - A descriptive message of the error that occurred.
        blocking - A boolean that describes whether the error is blocking or not.
        severity - The severity of the error.
